works.description: The site robotics-club.com is using multiple images and sales copy from our website, buildcoolrobots.com. The images buildcoolrobots.png, robots_combining_education_and_fun.jpg, and the blue background bar on top of the page were designed specifically for us by our graphics design/marketing firm (A Graphic Advantage; www.agraphicadvantage.com). First two paragraphs of sales copy in the box on the left, as well as the last sentence in the same box has been copied entirely (except our name changed to theirs); entire content of the box on the right has been copied entirely (with our name removed).
ALL text and images on this page have been copied entirely from our site (name changed from our company to theirs).
ALL text and images on this page have been copied entirely from our site (name changed from our company to theirs).
ALL text and images on this page have been copied entirely from our site (name changed from our company to theirs).
ALL text and images on this page have been copied entirely from our site (name changed from our company to theirs).
ALL text and images on this page have been copied entirely from our site (name changed from our company to theirs).
ALL text and images on this page have been copied entirely from our site (name changed from our company to theirs).

Most sales copy (some changes to tailor their program) is copied from our website on this page. Images of a girl wearing graduation gown and hat and stairway leading to open door (sky is the limit image) are iStockPhoto images; we contacted iStockPhoto to investigate whether these were purchased or copied from our site.
The blue background bar on top of this page, some sales copy - 2nd paragraph under "Our Objective" and entire text under "All the hardware and software needed for our robotics course"
Blue bar on top of page; entire text under "Robotics" (names changed; word "Classes" changed to "Sessions" in sub-heading)
